Abstract:
The MODIS/Terra V5 LST/E L3 Global 1 Km Grid (Short name: MOD11A1) products incorporate 1-km pixels, which are produced daily using the generalized split-window LST algorithm. This algorithm is optimally used to separate ranges of atmospheric column water vapor and lower boundary air surface temperatures into tractable sub-ranges. The surface emissivities in bands 31 and 32 are estimated from land cover types.

The V5 MOD11A1 products are projected in a Sinusoidal grid by mapping the level-2 LST product (MOD11_L2) on 1-kilometer (precisely 0.928-km) grids. The MOD11A1 product comprises the following Science Data Set (SDS) layers for daytime and nighttime observations: LSTs, quality control assessments, observation times, view zenith angles, clear sky coverages, and bands 31 and 32 emissivities from land cover types.

The V5 Terra/MODIS LST/E products, including MOD11A1, are validated to Stage-2 through field campaigns and radiance-based validation studies. Further details regarding MODIS land product validation for the LST/E products are available from the following URL: http://landval.gsfc.nasa.gov/ProductStatus.php?ProductID=MOD11

This product is ready for use in science applications/publications.

The V5 MOD11A1 product’s acquisition range started March 5, 2000 (2000-065) and will continue until sometime after the V6 reprocessing is complete. The V5 collection is not consistent with V4 and V41, and users should exercise caution as they plan to use the different collections.

V005 Data Set Characteristics: 
Temporal Coverage: V005 March 5, 2000 – March 30, 2017
Area: ~1100 x 1100 km 
Image Dimensions: 1200 x 1200 rows/columns 
Spatial Resolution: ~1 kilometer (actual: 0.93km) 
Projection: Sinusoidal 
File Size: ~2.1 MB 
Data Format: HDF-EOS 
Science Data Sets (SDS HDF Layers): 12

RelatedUrls.Description: Data set landing page at the LP DAAC
LP DAAC Data Pool provides direct access to all currently available MODIS products and the ability to download them via HTTP.

USGS EarthExplorer (EE) provides users the ability to query, search and order archived ASTER and MODIS products available from the LP DAAC.  Registered users of EE have access to additional features than guest users.

The Land Processes Distributed Active Archive Center (LP DAAC) is one of several discipline-specific data centers within the NASA Earth Observing System Data and Information System (EOSDIS).  The LP DAAC Web page provides information about available data products, services, documentation, order interfaces, and tools.
The MODIS Land home page is maintained through NASA's Goddard Space Flight Center and documents various aspects of the land component of the MODIS mission.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: HORIZONTALTILENUMBER
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Horizontal tile number of a grid, which increases from left to right.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: N_GRAN_POINTERS
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Total number of input granule files used to create this tile; number of elements in the InputGranulePointer archive metadata field.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAFRACTIONGOODQUALITY
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Fraction of pixels with good quality of product

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAFRACTIONNOTPRODUCEDCLOUD
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Fraction of pixels without product due to cloud

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAFRACTIONNOTPRODUCEDOTHER
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Fraction of pixels without product due to reasons other than cloud

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAFRACTIONOTHERQUALITY
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Fraction of pixels with not so good quality of product

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTGOODQUALITY
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels with good quality

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTNOTPRODUCEDOTHER
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels not produced due to some reason other than cloud

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTOTHERQUALITY
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels with not so good quality

AdditionalAttributes.Name: VERTICALTILENUMBER
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Vertical tile number of a grid, which increases from top to bottom.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: TileID
AdditionalAttributes.Description: MODIS Land tile identification number which represents a geographical area on the surface of the Earth bounded by latitude and longitude coordinates.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: PROCESSVERSION
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Version of the process software that generated the product.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: CLOUD_CONTAMINATED_LST_SCREENED
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Indicator of whether cloud-contaminated Land Surface Temperature values are screened off.

EntryTitle: MODIS/Terra Land Surface Temperature/Emissivity Daily L3 Global 1km SIN Grid V005

Characteristics.Name: EquatorCrossingTime
Characteristics.Description: Local time of the equator crossing and direction (ascending or descending)

DataCenters.LongName: Land Processes Distributed Active Archive Center

ContactInformation.ServiceHours: M-F, 8 a.m. to 4 p.m. Central Time

StreetAddresses: U.S. Geological Survey, Earth Resources Observation and Science (EROS) Center
